channel.title: Return of rs2 hacking?
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=poll/rs2007-server
What does this mean for RS2 hacking?

item.title: Return of rs2 hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Logistician Logistician
item.description:
@Logistician wrote:

Thats why I’m here again… learning.

Read full topic

item.title: Return of rs2 hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:486458”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=604692.msg4231962#msg4231962 date=1361330424]

Why wouldn’t botting be viable?

Since the worlds will likely be crowded

[/quote]You can still bot in crowded worlds :P[/quote]

I didn’t say you can’t bot, I said it wouldn’t be viable:

I still think that bots will be written though, mostly as fun projects rather than as a means of making money.

Read full topic

item.title: Return of rs2 hacking?
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[quote=“Echo_, post:7, topic:486458”][quote author=XxJtxX link=topic=604692.msg4231630#msg4231630 date=1361308591]

[quote author=Echo_ link=topic=604692.msg4228921#msg4228921 date=1361149032]

Since it’s not the official RuneScape revision, it will probably receive less attention than you think. Just look at the RSC botting scene.
[/quote]hhhehehe nice try

Explain
[/quote]They’re bringing back the golden age of RuneScape. Of course it will receive A LOT more attention that RSC.

There will be a lot more attention for nostalgic reasons, but Jagex will continue to focus their time and money on the main revision and therefore there will be less servers than there were in 2007. Since the worlds will likely be crowded, botting won’t be a viable option, and that kinda kills the point in writing a bot.

Unless of course you’re just writing the bot for fun.[/quote]Why wouldn’t botting be viable?

Read full topic

item.title: Return of rs2 hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

[quote=“XxJtxX, post:6, topic:486458”][quote author=Echo_ link=topic=604692.msg4228921#msg4228921 date=1361149032]

[quote author=vortex link=topic=604692.msg4228733#msg4228733 date=1361135385]

Since it’s not the official RuneScape revision, it will probably receive less attention than you think. Just look at the RSC botting scene.
[/quote]hhhehehe nice try

Explain
[/quote]They’re bringing back the golden age of RuneScape. Of course it will receive A LOT more attention that RSC.[/quote]

There will be a lot more attention for nostalgic reasons, but Jagex will continue to focus their time and money on the main revision and therefore there will be less servers than there were in 2007. Since the worlds will likely be crowded, botting won’t be a viable option, and that kinda kills the point in writing a bot.

Unless of course you’re just writing the bot for fun.

Read full topic
